name: The Story of Nancy McGunnell: A 17776 Fan Game
name_original: The Story of Nancy McGunnell: A 17776 Fan Game
description:
Taking place in the world of 17776 by Jon Bois and SBNation.com, this short game takes you through a few key points in the life of Nancy McGunnell, someone that in the year 17776 is a star cross country football player in a far off, immortal America.

Made by Derek Reynolds for English 101.

Story, characters, and music are taken from 17776. You can read 17776 here:
https://www.sbnation.com/a/17776-football
17776 is written and illustrated by Jon Bois and hosted by SB Nation.

Music used from the story:
Zero Gravity - Richard Birdsall
Sursaut Gamma - Olivier Samouillan
Flying Dragon - Dieter Reith
Sweet Victory - Alan Hawksha
